errors.error_description: The example command for checking a C++ file uses a non-existent flag '--check', which will cause the command to fail.
correction_candidates: Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck bad_cpp.rst'.
Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck < bad_cpp.rst'.
errors.golden_answer: Change '$ rstcheck --check bad_cpp.rst' to '$ rstcheck bad_cpp.rst'.
